eas_text: A civil authority has issued A LAW ENFORCEMENT WARNING for the following counties or areas: Benton, AR; at 01:39 PM ON DEC 21, 2025 Effective until 01:39 AM DEC 22, 2025. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: Dorothy Glasser 86yoa. White Female Gray hair Blue eyes. Missing from city of Rogers. Last seen wearing light color long sleeve top and blue jeans. may have a purple coat. Missing person is diagnosed with dementia for further description or information contact the Rogers Police Department. A photo of missing person is posted on RPD facebook page. If located please call Rogers Police Dept at 4796364141 or dial 9.1.1.
